LinuxRegEx.kernel: [kernel versions that are supported in the environment, for example: 2.6.32-358.el6.x86_64|2.6.32-504.el6.x86_64]
LinuxRegEx.OS: [OS version that is supported in the environment, for example: 6.4|6.6]

WindowsRegEx.kernel: [Windows kernel version supported in the environment, for example: 6]
WindowsRegEx.OS: [OS version supported in the environment, for example: 2008|2012]

Configuration.ClaimUserName: [user account to use when claiming servers, for example: claim_user]
Configuration.ClaimPassword: [user password to use when claiming servers, for example: Password_111

Zookeeper.Staging: [Staging Zookeeper server names, for example: Staging01, Staging02, Staging03]
Zookeeper.UAT: [UAT Zookeeper server names, for example: UAT01, UAT02, UAT03]
Zookeeper.Production: [Production Zookeeper server name, for example: Production01, Production02, Production03, Production04, Production05

AWS.AccessKey: [AWS access key. User must have at least read access to EC2]
